values: 中风；击球（动作）；（网球、高尔夫等的）一杆；（书写或绘画的）一笔；（音乐的）一拍；（发动机的）冲程；（钟表的）报时；轻抚；摩擦；（对毛发的）轻扫；划水动作
轻抚；抚摸；轻触；抚摩（物体表面或头发等）；轻挪；轻拭；画线；涂抹；笔画；在…上轻轻画线；在…上轻轻涂抹；敲击；击球；

synonym.mean: 中风；冲程；笔画；打击；尝试；轻抚
击球；作尾桨手；敲击键盘

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 击，打；（用笔等）画；划掉（stroke的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 有利可图的交易；赚钱的交易
什么也不干；根本不工作
word_group.phrase: not do a stroke of work

word_group.brief_definition: 什么也不干；根本不工作
word_group.phrase: never do a stroke of work

word_group.brief_definition: 冲程长度；行程长度；笔画长短

bilingual.source: Her father had a stroke last year.
He was hospitalized because of a stroke.
The patient has brain damage due to a stroke.
bilingual.target: 这个病人因中风而有脑残。

bilingual.source: After the stroke, his right hand was immobile.
bilingual.target: 中风后，他的右手无法动弹。

bilingual.source: Blockage in the carotid artery can lead to a stroke.
bilingual.target: 颈动脉堵塞可能导致中风。

bilingual.source: The stroke affected the contralateral side of his body.
bilingual.target: 中风影响了他身体的对侧。

bilingual.source: Timely treatment can reduce the damage of a stroke.
bilingual.target: 及时治疗可以减少中风的损害。

bilingual.source: Narrowing of the internal carotid can lead to a stroke.
bilingual.target: 颈内动脉狭窄可能导致中风。

bilingual.source: The patient's arm was flaccid after the stroke.
bilingual.target: 中风后，病人的手臂变得松弛无力。

bilingual.source: He had a stroke last year and is still recovering.
bilingual.target: 他去年中风了，现在还在恢复中。

list.abstract: STROKE（英[strəʊk]，美[stroʊk]），英语单词。作名词时，释义为敲；打；击。作动词时，释义为轻抚；摩；捋。短语搭配为at a stroke（一下子）。例句为“Front crawl is a popular stroke.（自由泳是一种流行的游泳姿势。）” 其名词性近义词有blow、shock、experiment，及物动词近义词有dong、daut，不及物动词近义词有hit the ball。

yingyinNormal.en: Relax. You're gonna give yourself a stroke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放松点儿，老这么紧张容易中风。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, what was that? I had a little stroke after "oral."
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，你刚说什么？我刚听到"口"字，微中风了一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Both of which may increase your risk of stroke, heart disease diabetes, obesity and cancer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 两者皆会增加中风、心脏疾病、糖尿病、肥胖与癌症的风险。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: You know if you had a stroke, she'd eat you, right? And it would be my pleasure to be her num-num.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道如果你中风倒下，她会把你吃掉，对吧？我很乐意成为她的美食。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I thought, if I have a stroke or a kidney stone, who would I want to share that with? And you picked me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反正我想如果我中风，或者得了肾结石，我会愿意和谁分享这件事呢？而你选择了我。

yingyinNormal.en: And the odds of digging around in me without causing either a massive stroke or a bleed-out are close enough to zero to pass for it in any math I know of.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要给我动手术而不引起大中风或大面积出血的概率据我经验，可能性几乎是零。

yingyinNormal.en: That's lucky! Yes, what a stroke of luck!
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是幸运！是啊，真是意外的幸运！

yingyinNormal.en: Just pin me down and stroke my hair, and I'll be fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把我按倒抚摸我的头发，就会没事的。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has found the duck pond. That's lucky. Yes, what a stroke of luck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸找到了鸭子的池塘。太幸运了。是的，多么意外的幸运。

yingyinNormal.en: What a stroke of luck! Now we just have to wait until the electricity comes back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是意外的幸运！现在我们只需要等着来电了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Binky, the buchy. Hello Binky. Woo. Can I stroke Binky? Yes, very gently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一只鹦鹉，叫做宾奇。你好啊，宾奇。哇。我能摸一下宾奇吗？可以，但是你要轻一点哦。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Oh. Daddy Pig has found the duck pond. That's lucky. Yes, what a stroke of luck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸找到了鸭子们的池塘，真是幸运啊。是啊，她们还真是幸运。

yingyinNormal.en: That shell is his house. It's very high if he gets hurt. Would you like to stroke him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个壳就是他的家。当他感到害怕的时候就会躲进去。你们想要摸摸他吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The banks will think we're either high or having a stroke. They'll take every dime we have to offer. Kinda brilliant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 银行会以为我们不是喝大就是抽风了，他们会收下我们交的每一分溢价，挺聪明。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, is the water cold? A little bit. The wind has blown the ball out of the pond. That's lucky. Yes, what a stroke of luck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，水里面冷不冷啊？有一点点冷。大风又把球吹出了池塘。太幸运了。是啊，确实运气不错。

yingyinNormal.en: I am sure it is here somewhere. Daddy, we've found the torch. Luckily, it was in the kitchen all the time. What a stroke of luck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我记得就在这附近。爸爸，我们找到了手电筒。幸好，它就一直在厨房里放着呢。真是幸运啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. I may have mentioned that you had a budding interest in the promotional arts, and, total stroke of luck, Merv's assistant is very, very sick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好像跟他提过，你对宣传推广行业萌生了兴趣，撞大运的是，梅尔夫的助手得了很重很重的病。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden disabling attack or loss of consciousness caused by an interruption in the flow of blood to the brain, especially through thrombosis

examination_example.sentence: The science tells us that means real health benefits — fewer heart attacks, <highlight>strokes</highlight> and premature births, less cancer, dementia and asthma.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学告诉我们，这意味着真正的健康益处——减少心脏病发作、中风和早产，减少癌症、痴呆症和哮喘。
模仿你最喜欢的游泳姿势。

sense_info_list.en: an act of hitting or striking
an act of moving your hand gently over a surface
a mark made by moving a pen, brush, etc. once across a surface
each of the sounds made by a clock or bell giving the hours

word_usage.usage: stroke作疾病讲意为“中风”，have / suffer a stroke意为“患上中风”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden disabling attack or loss of consciousness caused by an interruption in the flow of blood to the brain, especially through thrombosis

examination_example.sentence: Prevention of heart disease and <highlight>stroke</highlight> will increase life expectancy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 防心脏病和中风将延长预期寿命。

examination_example.sentence: The resolution of age-associated diseases like heart disease and <highlight>stroke</highlight> will inform us about ageing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决与年龄相关的疾病，如心脏病和中风，会让我们了解衰老。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden disabling attack or loss of consciousness caused by an interruption in the flow of blood to the brain; especially through thrombosis

examination_example.sentence: According to the World Health Organization, 80 percent of deaths from heart disease and <highlight>stroke</highlight> are caused by high blood pressure, tobacco use, elevated cholesterol and low consumption of fruits and vegetables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据世界卫生组织的数据，80%死于心脏病和中风的人是由高血压、吸烟、胆固醇升高以及水果和蔬菜食用过少引起的。

sense_info_list.en: an act of hitting or striking

exam_freq_info.chinese: 划桨动作; 划水动作

sense_info_list.zh: 划桨动作; 划水动作

examination_example.sentence: After only a few <highlight>strokes</highlight>, he sits down and begins to think of all the fun he has planned for the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只划了几下，他就坐下来，开始思考他为今天计划的所有乐趣。

examination_example.sentence: Schlaug, a doctor at Harvard Medical School, works with <highlight>stroke</highlight> (中风) patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哈佛医学院的医生Schlaug从事中风患者的工作。
